activeSubscriptionTitle: You already have an active Gaia subscription
activeSubscriptionText: If you’d like to make changes to your plan or billing information, please visit the
activeSubscriptionChildText: Changes to your plan and billing information can be done by your account’s primary subscription holder via their My Account section.
inactiveSubscriptionChildTitle: The Gaia subscription associated with your account is no longer active
inactiveSubscriptionChildText: To reactivate your subscription, ask your account’s primary subscription holder to reactivate their membership via their My Account section.
